info.title: HyperDX External API
info.description: API for managing HyperDX alerts and dashboards

tags.name: Dashboards
tags.description: Endpoints for managing dashboards and their visualizations

by.description: User ID who silenced the alert.

savedSearchId.description: Saved search ID for saved_search alerts.

groupBy.description: Group-by key for saved search alerts.

threshold.description: Threshold value for triggering the alert.

sourceId.description: ID of the data source for this series

aggFn.description: Aggregation function to use on the data

where.description: Filter condition in Lucene query syntax

whereLanguage.description: Query language used in the where clause

groupBy.description: Fields to group the results by

metricName.description: Name of the metric (for metric data sources)

ts_bucket.description: Timestamp of the data point (bucket start time)

group.description: Group by values if groupBy was specified

NumberFormatOutput.description: Output format type (currency, percent, byte, time, number).

AggregationFunction.description: Aggregation function to apply to the field or metric value.

QueryLanguage.description: Query language for the where clause.

MetricDataType.description: Metric data type for metrics data sources.

TimeSeriesDisplayType.description: Visual representation type for the time series.

decimalBytes.description: Use decimal bytes (1000) vs binary bytes (1024).

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query

aggFn.description: Aggregation function to apply to the field or metric value

level.description: Percentile level for quantile aggregations (e.g., 0.95 for p95)

field.description: Field/property name to aggregate (required for most aggregation functions except count)

alias.description: Display name for the series in the chart

where.description: Filter query for the data (syntax depends on whereLanguage)

whereLanguage.description: Query language for the where clause

groupBy.description: Fields to group results by (creates separate series for each group)

metricName.description: Metric name for metrics data sources

displayType.description: Visual representation type for the time series

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query

aggFn.description: Aggregation function to apply to the field or metric value

level.description: Percentile level for quantile aggregations (e.g., 0.95 for p95)

metricDataType.description: Metric data type for metrics data sources

metricName.description: Metric name for metrics data sources

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query

aggFn.description: Aggregation function to apply to the field or metric value

level.description: Percentile level for quantile aggregations (e.g., 0.95 for p95)

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query

fields.description: List of field names to display in the search results table

where.description: Filter query for the data (syntax depends on whereLanguage)

whereLanguage.description: Query language for the where clause

content.example:
# Dashboard Title

This is a markdown widget.

asRatio.description: Display two series as a ratio (series[0] / series[1])

series.description: Data series to display in this tile (all must be the same type)

tiles.description: List of tiles/charts in the dashboard

tags.description: Tags for organizing and filtering dashboards

tiles.description: Tiles must include their IDs for updates. To add a new tile, generate a unique ID (max 36 chars).

get.description: Retrieves a specific alert by ID
Retrieves a list of all alerts for the authenticated team

value.name: Error Spike Alert
value.message: Error rate has exceeded 100 in the last hour

post.description: Retrieves time series data based on configured series parameters

value.error: All series must have the same groupBy fields
